settings.faq_title: How do I find my perfect size?
settings.faq_text: Consult our detailed sizing chart on each product page for accurate measurements and fit guidance. If you have further questions, our customer service is here to assist.

settings.faq_title: What is the return policy for  items?
settings.faq_text: Our return window is within 30 days of purchase. Items must be unworn, with tags attached. Refer to our Refund Policy for more details on the return process.

settings.faq_title: Are your products true to size?
settings.faq_text: Our sizing is designed to be accurate, and each product page provides specific size details. If you need personalized assistance, our customer service team is ready to help.

settings.faq_title: Can I exchange an item for a different size or style?
settings.faq_text: Currently, we don't offer direct exchanges. For a different size or style, follow our return process and place a new order for your desired item.
